message.body: $TSLA UPDATE 1-T. Rowe Price raises bet on Tesla in vote of confidence for Musk https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/10/reuters-america-update-1-t-rowe-price-raises-bet-on-tesla-in-vote-of-confidence-for-musk.html

links.title: UPDATE 1-T. Rowe Price raises bet on Tesla in vote of confidence for Musk
links.description: SAN FRANCISCO, Oct 10- Tesla shareholder T. Rowe Price Group Inc raised its stake in the electric car maker by nearly half in the July-September quarter, according to a regulatory filing on Wednesday, an apparent vote of confidence for embattled CEO Elon Musk. T.

message.body: $TSLA Tesla is close to securing land for its Shanghai factory https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/10/tesla-is-close-to-securing-land-for-its-shanghai-factory.html

links.title: Tesla is close to securing land for its Shanghai factory
links.description: Wang Zhao | AFP | Getty Images Tesla is moving toward securing a $145 million plot of land for its planned factory in Shanghai, China, Bloomberg reported Wednesday, citing unnamed sources. The automaker is the sole bidder on the plot of land, and the Shanghai government could award the deal to Tesla as soon as this month, the report said.

links.title: T. Rowe Price raises bet on Tesla in vote of confidence for Musk | MarketScreener
links.description: A subsidiary of T. Rowe that manages the company's mutual funds increased its investment in Tesla to 10.2 percent during a tumultuous quarter for the Palo Alto, California-based car maker, highlighted by controversial tweets by Musk about taking the company private.

links.description: PDF James Murdoch in line to replace Musk as Tesla chairman: FT | Reuters 4 Min Read (Reuters) - Outgoing Twenty-First Century Fox Inc ( FOXA.O ) Chief Executive James Murdoch is the lead candidate to replace Elon Musk as Tesla Inc ( TSLA.O ) chairman, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing two people briefed on the discussions.
